item.title: Real-time modelling
item.description: Mgmt runs in real-time, by using our clever domain specific language called mcl. The mcl language efficiently compiles once, and then runs continuously, only making changes when it detects that a state change has occured.

item.title: Fast
item.description: Mgmt is so incredibly fast, because it’s well-written in golang and algorithmically more clever than traditional tools. Written in golang for speed! Faster runtime than python, ruby, and other interpreted languages. Algorithmically clever We track state to avoid ever needing to re-check the resource graph until an event suggest that we need to!

item.title: Event-driven
item.description: Our resources and functions are all event-driven. The efficiently compute and re-compute only when necessary, while also giving users the opportunity to model the changing of time succinctly.

item.title: Reactive
item.description: Mgmt’s resources efficiently monitor their desired state, to ensure you’re constantly converged, and so that we can avoid unnecessary, resource-wasting polling.

item.title: Distributed
item.description: Mgmt can run as a distributed system, so there’s no single-point-of-failure, and you can avoid the hassle of managing a central automation server.
